Title: slideNotify-2
Description: Add a clean slide-in notification panel to FileMaker layouts. This widget smoothly slides in from the right and displays color-coded alerts (Green, Orange, Red) with dynamic updates.
Features: Slide-in notification panel that animates from the right
Three severity levels: 0 = Green, 1 = Orange, 2 = Red
Customisable text, colors, and auto-dismiss timing
Trigger updates dynamically via FileMaker scripts
Lightweight, responsive, and easy to integrate
Ideal for alerts, reminders, or status messages
